headline: How Seagate’s 84% Surge and AI Demand Shape Its 2025 Value Appeal
summary: If you have been keeping an eye on Seagate Technology Holdings, you are likely debating whether now is the right moment to get in or cash out. The stock has been on a tear this year, surging nearly 84% year-to-date and more than 41% over the last three months alone. It is not just a short-term pop, either, as the five-year return stands at an impressive 210%. These moves have caught the attention of both cautious investors and bullish momentum chasers, especially with the tech sector facing...
